content: Buntarou SHIZUKI Buntarou SHIZUKI [English/Japanese] Research Interests User Interface and Human Computer Interaction Designing interaction with Large/Small displays Visual Programming Publications (and etc.)... list Related Projects(including past projects) ACM International Collegiate Programming Contest, Asian Regional Contest at TSUKUBA UI Projects@Tokyo Institute of Technology(past) Related Links Interactive Programming Laboratory Department of Computer Science University of Tsukuba Graduate School of Systems and Information Engineering, Department of Computer Science, University of Tsukuba, Tennoudai 1-1-1, Tsukuba, Ibaraki, JAPAN (zip: 305-8573) TEL,FAX: +81 29 853 5520, +81 29 853 5165 OFFICE: B1005 shizuki@cs.tsukuba.ac.jp
